data.title: How to get there – Oficina de Turisme de Tossa de Mar
data.meta_site_name: Oficina de Turisme de Tossa de Mar
data.text:
Coming from the north, exit the AP-7 motorway at the junction 9 to Vidreres, Lloret de Mar and Tossa de Mar or by the N-II national road, exiting in Vidreres, Lloret de Mar.

Then, to get to Tossa, there is the option to continue towards Lloret de Mar and further on to Tossa, or to continue on the road to Sant Feliu de Guíxols and Platja d’Aro and take the exit to Tossa.

Coming from the south, exit the AP-7 motorway at the junction 9 to Vidreres, Lloret de Mar and Tossa de Mar or by the N-II national road, exit in Vidreres, Lloret de Mar. If you are using the C-32 motorway take the last junction to Blanes Costa Brava. Or if you’re on the N-II national road, exit in Blanes and then follow the signs to Lloret de Mar and Tossa de Mar.

FROM BARCELONA

MOVENTIS SARFA – T. 902 302 025

Departures from Barcelona airport (T1 & T2), from Estació del Nord (Pl. Ali Bei, 80) and from Ronda St. Pere in summer.

FROM GIRONA

MOVENTIS SARFA (only summer) – T. 902 302 025

Departures from bus station, Pl. Espanya, s/n

SAGALÉS, S.L. – T. +34 902 130 014

Departures from Girona bus station, Pl. Espanya, s/n to Lloret de Mar. Change bus in Lloret de Mar to continue journey to Tossa.

TEISA (from 01/10 to 30/06, monday to thursday) – T. +34 972 204 868

Depart from Girona bus station, Pl. Espanya, s/n to Llagostera. In Llagostera you change into a SARFA bus that continues to Tossa at 07.10 h, 03.35 p.m. & 06.30 p.m.

FROM LLORET DE MAR

PUJOL – T. +34 972 364 476

Departures from bus station

FROM BLANES

PUJOL– T. +34 972 337 842

Departures from bus station (C/ Lluís Companys, 32) and from Plaça Catalunya to Lloret de Mar. In Lloret de Mar bus station, change into another bus of the same company to arrive to Tossa.

In case of departures from the railway station in Blanes, ask the driver if it is necessary to change bus at Lloret bus station, because some buses continue directly to Tossa but others don’t.

FROM BARCELONA

Take the RENFE commuter train, Line R1, towards Maçanet-Massanes or Blanes. Departures from Barcelona Sants Station, Plaça de Catalunya, Arc de Triomf and El Clot-Aragó. You must get off in Blanes and from there continue to Tossa either by bus (PUJOL) or taxi.

RENFE information: +34 91 232 03 20

FROM OTHER COUNTRIES

High speed trains from France (Paris, Lyon, Toulouse, Marseille) to Girona and Barcelona.

French trains until Cerbère (France) and from there continue with the Spanish trains, line RG1, to Portbou, Figueres, Girona, Maçanet (& direct into Blanes with some trains or changing in Maçanet for line R1 to Blanes). Once in Blanes follow instructions of the previous section to get to Tossa by bus.

RENFE information – Tel. +34 91 232 03 20

FROM ANY CITY IN SPAIN

Look for high speed and regional trains having as main destination either Girona or Barcelona and continue from there by bus following the instructions from the previous section.

RENFE information – Tel. +34 91 232 03 20

JOSEP TARRADELLAS BARCELONA – EL PRAT AIRPORT

Location: 16 km. South from Barcelona city on the motorway to Castelldefels and at 107 km. from Tossa de Mar.

Information: +34 913 211 000

CONNECTIONS WITH TOSSA DE MAR

By bus: with MOVENTIS-SARFA company, destination Lloret & Tossa. Departures from the airport, T2 & T1, from the “Estació del Nord” Barcelona Bus Station, located at Plaça d’Ali Bei, 80, and during the summer, also from Ronda de Sant Pere.

Information: Tel. +34 902 302 025

By train: from the airport into the railway station of Barcelona-Sants and change train to take the RENFE commuter line towards Massanet-Massanes or Blanes. Get off the train in Blanes.

Once you get to Blanes, you have to take either the PUJOL bus company going to Lloret de Mar and Tossa de Mar, that stops shortly in Lloret and continues until Tossa de Mar bus station; or a taxi directly into Tossa.

CONNECTIONS WITH BARCELONA CITY

By train: into the stations of Sants, Plaça Catalunya, Arc de Triomf and Clot Aragó. RENFE information.

AEROBUS bus line: T2 & T1, into Plaça d’Espanya, Gran Via / Urgell, Plaça Universitat, Plaça de Catalunya.
